[http://www.warnertvasia.com/sg Official Website] (Southeast Asia) | terr serv 1 = | terr chan 1 = | sat serv 1 = [[Dish Network Mexico]] | sat chan 1 = Channel 210 | sat serv 2 = [[Indovision]] (Indonesia) | sat chan 2 = Channel 163 | sat serv 3 = [[Sky Brasil]] (Brazil) | sat chan 3 = Channel 44 | sat serv 4 = [[Sky Mexico]] (Mexico) | sat chan 4 = Channel 205 | sat serv 5 = [[DishHD]] (Taiwan) | sat chan 5 = Channel 6635 | sat serv 6 = [[Oi TV]] (Brazil) | sat chan 6 = Channel 200 | cable serv 1 = [[StarHub TV]] (Singapore) | cable chan 1 = Channel 515 | cable serv 2 = [[SkyCable]] (Philippines) | cable chan 2 = Channel TBA | cable serv 3 = [[First Media]] (Indonesia) | cable chan 3 = Channel 259 | sat radio serv 1 = | sat radio chan 1 = | adsl serv 1 = [[now TV]] (Hong Kong) | adsl chan 1 = Channel 530 | adsl serv 2 = [[Groovia TV]] (Indonesia) | adsl chan 2 = Channel ??? | adsl serv 3 = [[UniFi]] (Malaysia) | adsl chan 3 = Channel 162 | online serv 1 = | online chan 1 = | 3gmobile serv 1 = }} '''Warner Channel''' (commonly shortened to '''WBTV''', but not to be confused with [[the WB Television Network]] or [[Charlotte, North Carolina]] station [[WBTV]], and currently referred to in promos as simply '''Warner''' in Latin America and '''WarnerTV''' in Asia) is a [[Latin America]]n and [[Asia]]n [[cable television]] channel owned by [[Time Warner]]'s [[HBO Asia]]/[[HBO Latin America Group]] (as a joint venture with sister company [[Warner Bros.]]) that focuses on airing [[United States|American]]-produced series and films. Most of the shows air in their original [[English language]] audio, with subtitles in [[Spanish language|Spanish]] (for Latin American Countries), [[Portuguese language|Portuguese]] (for Brazil), [[Chinese language|Chinese]] (For Taiwan and Hong Kong), [[Malaysian language|Malaysian]] (For Malaysia) and [[Indonesian Language|Indonesian]] (For Indonesia), but there are also some [[dubbing (filmmaking)|dubbed]] shows. Warner Channel headquarters are located in [[Brazil]], [[Venezuela]], [[Chile]], [[Singapore]] and [[Malaysia]]; the broadcasting, however, is generated in [[Miami]] for Latin American and Singapore for Asian Channel. Most, but not all, series that air on the channel are in the Warner Bros. library. ==Warner Channel Shows== ===2010=== * ''[[Nikita (2010 TV series)|Nikita]]'' * ''[[Chase (2010 TV series)|Chase]]'' * ''[[Better With You]]'' * ''[[Mike & Molly]] * ''[[The Middle (TV series)|The Middle]]'' (''Currently Airing New Episodes'') * ''[[Men of a Certain Age (TV series)|Men of a Certain Age]]'' (''July 13'') * ''[[Human Target (2010 TV series)|Human Target]]'' (''April 5.
